snippet: Seven Sunni construction workers were killed by unidentified gunmen who fired on them from a speeding S.U.V. in Abara, a majority-Sunni village in Diyala Province, police and medical officials said.
abstract: Thirteen Sunni Muslims are killed in Diyala Province, Iraq, and a suicide bomber in the province kills 12 at a Shiite shrine.
lead_paragraph: Seven Sunni construction workers were killed by unidentified gunmen who fired on them from a speeding S.U.V. in Abara, a majority-Sunni village in Diyala Province, police and medical officials said.
